thread.section_title: Hotel Diana - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Lovely compact hotel
thread.title_full: Lovely compact hotel - Review of Hotel Diana, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Mazbury
title: Lovely compact hotel
text:
I stayed here with 2 travel companions for 2 nights. We were able to have the triple room and for 3 adults provided plenty of room.
The bathroom is large and modern and always spotlessly clean. Lovely towels and toiletries.
The lift is old and small so I would avoid if you don't like lifts.
The staff are very friendly and you only have to ask if you need anything.
The fee wifi was excellent and fast.
The location is excellent and there are many restaurants nearby.
I would definitely stay at this hotel again and thank them for a very pleasant stay.
